message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 split seems fair.
Alice, let's do 55/45. This is a more equitable split given the situation. Think about it!

Bob, it seems the inflation is working in your favor, but my offer from round 1 still stands as fair. I'll take the 60/40 split you rejected, but to show I'm flexible, you can have the larger share.  Don't wait too long, this deal won't last forever.
